name: The Best Defense
description:
The Best Defense is a Dungeon-Crawl game inspired by Egyptian Mythology and Pinball! You awake in the depths of your tomb  and Anubis challenges you to survive your way to the top using only a golden shield. If you complete this mission successfully, maybe there will be a place for you in Duat.

Game developed in Polytechnic Institute of Setúbal by:

Bernardo Mota

João Mendes

Daniel Sousa

Israel Pereira

Teacher-coordinator: João Morais
